caption:
Just over a month after its grand opening, the Boys & Girls Club of Crawford County in Robinson, Illinois, is already making a big impact. 💪

With 80+ kids enrolled and attendance growing every day, the Club provides a safe, supportive space for kindergarten through 5th graders after school. From dance parties to STEM clubs, there’s no shortage of fun and learning. 🎒

We’re proud that our Robinson refinery team is one of the Club’s biggest supporters, alongside so many others in the community, helping turn this longtime dream into reality. 🙌

Swipe ⏩️ to a look at some of the memories already being made! 📸

Want to know more? Tap the link in our bio to check out our original story!
